name: Abdul-Basir Yousuf
story: Abdul-Basir Yousuf was born and raised in Shiraz, Iran. He joined the military at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks, earning his current title of Sergeant. Abdul-Basir is a skilled crewman and is highly respected by his fellow soldiers. He is fiercely loyal to his country and to his religion, adhering strictly to the tenets of Islam. Abdul-Basir is married with two children, which he considers to be his greatest blessings. He has a commanding presence and is always striving to better himself and his unit, both on and off the battlefield.
